scripts.certbot-dryrun: docker compose run --rm  certbot certonly --dry-run --webroot -w /var/www/html -d crece-en-libertad.owensapi.com -d www.crece-en-libertad.owensapi.com
scripts.certbot: docker compose run --rm  certbot certonly --webroot -w /var/www/html -d crece-en-libertad.owensapi.com -d www.crece-en-libertad.owensapi.com --agree-tos --email owencoogan01@live.fr
scripts.run-prod: docker build -t bookazikos-node-js . && docker compose docker-compose-prod.yml up && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.prep-db-prod: sequelize db:migrate --env production && sequelize db:seed:all --env production && node server.js
